greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (a(n-1) + a(n-3)) / gcd(a(n-1), a(n-3)) with a(0) = a(1) = 1 and a(2) = 3.
comment: This sequence is to A179070 (without initial term) as A214551 is to A000930. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 23 2012
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: where f u v = (u + v) `div` gcd u v
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 23 2012
